title: Find the k Value
text: Let k $$=$$ the 90th percentile. Find k where P(Σx < k) $$=$$ 0.90.

title: Find the k Value
text: k $$=$$ 237.8, draw a graph to help you comprehend

title: Explanation
text: The 90th percentile for the sum of 75 scores is about 237.8. This tells us that 90% of all the sums of 75 scores are no more than 237.8 and 10% are no less than 237.8.
